Test Name: ALK Mutation Analysis by Next-Generation Sequencing (Tumor)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect and characterize ALK gene mutations in tumor samples using next-generation sequencing for clinical interpretation.
Container: Unstained FFPE slides (5–10 µm sections) or cryogenic vial for fresh frozen tissue stored at −80 °C
Equipment: Microtome, DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop spectrophotometer, Qubit fluorometer, PCR thermal cycler, NGS library preparation kit, sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), bioinformatics analysis software
